verses.text: The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*; \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, and \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*.\f + \fr 6.1 \ft Gershon: or, Gershom\f*
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*; \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*, \w Izhar|strong="H3324"\w*, and \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*; \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*. The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* also of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*; \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*, and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w*, \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*.
¶ \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Abishua|strong="H0050"\w*,
And \w Abishua|strong="H0050"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Bukki|strong="H1231"\w*, and \w Bukki|strong="H1231"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w*,
And \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Zerahiah|strong="H2228"\w*, and \w Zerahiah|strong="H2228"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Meraioth|strong="H4812"\w*,
\w Meraioth|strong="H4812"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w*, and \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*,
And \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, and \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ahimaaz|strong="H0290"\w*,
And \w Ahimaaz|strong="H0290"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, and \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w*,

And \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, (he \add it is\add* that executed the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w* in the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* that \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*:)\f + \fr 6.10 \ft in the temple: Heb. in the house\f*
And \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w*, and \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*,

And \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, and \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*,\f + \fr 6.12 \ft Shallum: or, Meshullam\f*
And \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, and \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*,
And \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w*, and \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jehozadak|strong="H3087"\w*,

And \w Jehozadak|strong="H3087"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \add into captivity\add*, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* carried \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w*.
¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*; \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*, \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, and \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*.\f + \fr 6.16 \ft Gershom: or, Gershon\f*
And these \add be\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*; \w Libni|strong="H3845"\w*, and \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* \add were\add*, \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*, and \w Izhar|strong="H3324"\w*, and \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*; \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w*, and \w Mushi|strong="H4187"\w*. And these \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* according to their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Of \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*; \w Libni|strong="H3845"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Jahath|strong="H3189"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Zimmah|strong="H2155"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w Joah|strong="H3098"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Jeaterai|strong="H2979"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 6.21 \ft Joah: or, Ethan\f*\f + \fr 6.21 \ft Iddo: or, Adaiah\f*\f + \fr 6.21 \ft Jeaterai: also called, Ethni\f*

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*; \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Assir|strong="H0617"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,\f + \fr 6.22 \ft Amminadab: or, Izhar\f*
\w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Ebiasaph|strong="H0043"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Assir|strong="H0617"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w Tahath|strong="H8480"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Uriel|strong="H0222"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Shaul|strong="H7586"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*; \w Amasai|strong="H6022"\w*, and \w Ahimoth|strong="H0287"\w*.

\add As for\add* \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*: the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*; \w Zophai|strong="H6689"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Nahath|strong="H5184"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,\f + \fr 6.26 \ft Zophai: or, Zuph\f*
\w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*; the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w Vashni|strong="H2059"\w*, and \w Abiah|strong="H0029"\w*.\f + \fr 6.28 \ft Vashni: called also Joel\f*

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*; \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w*, \w Libni|strong="H3845"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Uzza|strong="H5798"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
\w Shimea|strong="H8092"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Haggiah|strong="H2293"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Asaiah|strong="H6222"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And these \add are they\add* whom \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* over the \w service|strong="H3027"\w* of \w song|strong="H7892"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, after that the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* had \w rest|strong="H4494"\w*.

And they \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w dwelling|strong="H4908"\w* place of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* with \w singing|strong="H7892"\w*, until \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and \add then\add* they \w waited|strong="H5975"\w* on their \w office|strong="H5656"\w* according to their \w order|strong="H4941"\w*.

And these \add are\add* they that \w waited|strong="H5975"\w* with their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*. Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*: \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w* a \w singer|strong="H7891"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemuel|strong="H8050"\w*,\f + \fr 6.33 \ft waited: Heb. stood\f*

The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Toah|strong="H8430"\w*,

The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zuph|strong="H6689"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mahath|strong="H4287"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amasai|strong="H6022"\w*,

The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w*,

The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Tahath|strong="H8480"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Assir|strong="H0617"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ebiasaph|strong="H0043"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*,

The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Izhar|strong="H3324"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, who \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* on his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \add even\add* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Berachiah|strong="H1296"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimea|strong="H8092"\w*,
The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Baaseiah|strong="H1202"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Malchiah|strong="H4441"\w*,
The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ethni|strong="H0867"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Adaiah|strong="H5718"\w*,
The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ethan|strong="H0387"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zimmah|strong="H2155"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*,
The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jahath|strong="H3189"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.

And their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* \add stood\add* on the left \w hand|strong="H8040"\w*: \w Ethan|strong="H0387"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kishi|strong="H7029"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abdi|strong="H5660"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Malluch|strong="H4409"\w*,\f + \fr 6.44 \ft Kishi: or, Kushaiah\f*
The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*,
The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amzi|strong="H0557"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shamer|strong="H8106"\w*,

The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mushi|strong="H4187"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.

Their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* also the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add were\add* \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* unto all manner of \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ But \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w offered|strong="H6999"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*, \add and were appointed\add* for all the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \add place\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, and to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, according to all that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

And these \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*; \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Abishua|strong="H0050"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
\w Bukki|strong="H1231"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Zerahiah|strong="H2228"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
\w Meraioth|strong="H4812"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
\w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Ahimaaz|strong="H0290"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

¶ Now these \add are\add* their dwelling \w places|strong="H4186"\w* throughout their \w castles|strong="H2918"\w* in their \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w*, of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*: for theirs was the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*.

And they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* it.

But the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* thereof, they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w*.

And to the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of Judah, \add namely\add*, \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, \add the city\add* of \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*, and \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Jattir|strong="H3492"\w*, and \w Eshtemoa|strong="H0851"\w*, with their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
And \w Hilen|strong="H2432"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,\f + \fr 6.58 \ft Hilen: or, Holon\f*
And \w Ashan|strong="H6228"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*:\f + \fr 6.59 \ft Ashan: or, Ain\f*

And out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*; \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Alemeth|strong="H5964"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*. All their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* throughout their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \add were\add* \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 6.60 \ft Alemeth: or, Almon\f*

And unto the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, \add which were\add* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of that \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*, \add were cities given\add* out of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*, \add namely, out of\add* the \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \add tribe\add* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And to the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w* throughout their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

Unto the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* \add were given\add* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, throughout their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add these\add* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*.

And they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, which are \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by \add their\add* \w names|strong="H8034"\w*.

And \add the residue\add* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* had \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of their \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.

And they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto them, \add of\add* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*, \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \add they gave\add* also \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
And \w Jokmeam|strong="H3361"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
And \w Aijalon|strong="H0357"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Gath-rimmon|strong="H1667"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*:

And out of the \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*; \w Aner|strong="H6063"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Bileam|strong="H1109"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, for the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w remnant|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*.

Unto the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w* \add were given\add* out of the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w Golan|strong="H1474"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*:

And out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*; \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \w Daberath|strong="H1705"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
